void NGS::uTags::writeSamToOutput ( std::ostream &  out  )  const

Write our data in Sam format, with some minor details missing.

Parameters:
out : Output stream to use.

< Since Picard tools poorly validates a sequence lenght, we must pad with = if we did not store sequences

< We store lenght as positive, but in Sam format it can be negative

int  left,
int  right 
)

Write a tag in Sam specification, but trimming a certain size both left and right of it.

Parameters:

left,: Number of bp to trim from left ( 3' direction ) of tag
right : Number of bp to trim from right ( 5' direction ) of tag.
